Professor's Note: This last view of the future value of a series of cash flows
suggests a quick way to calculate the future value of an uneven cash flow series.
The process described previously for the future value of a series of end-of-period
payments can be written mathematically as [(100 x 1.1) + 200] x 1.1 + 300
= 641, and this might be a quick way to do some future value problems.
